chapter.title: Introduction
chapter.para: This chapter describes the purpose of the example, as well as the general structure of the documentation.

section.title: Prerequisites
section.para: Running the example requires the following setup:

listitem.para: JBoss AS 5.1.0 GA or JBoss EAP 5 or higher

section.title: How to run the example
section.para:
Running the appliction consists of the following steps:
Building the application
Initializing the database
Preparing JBoss
Deploying the application

simplesect.title: Building the application
simplesect.para: The Sportsclub example uses maven, so it can be built by simply running:

informalexample.para: mvn clean packageThis will produce two EAR files, both named sportsclub.ear, located under sportsclub-ear/target and sportsclub-jpa-ear/target. They have the same functionality, but the underlying implementation of the persistence layer is different (one is using Hibernate, and another one uses JPA).
